pkgmetadata.longdescription: # soundcloud.py[![Tests](https://github.com/7x11x13/soundcloud.py/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/7x11x13/soundcloud.py/actions/workflows/ci.yml)[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/repos/github/7x11x13/soundcloud.py/badge.svg?branch=main)](https://coveralls.io/github/7x11x13/soundcloud.py?branch=main)Python wrapper for some of the v2 SoundCloud API## Installation```bashpip install soundcloud-v2```## Example```pythonfrom soundcloud import SoundCloudsc = SoundCloud("client_id", "auth_token")assert sc.is_client_id_valid()assert sc.is_auth_token_valid()me = sc.get_user_by_username("7x11x13")assert me.permalink == "7x11x13"```## License[MIT](https://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit/)
